name: Solar Decay
description:
Your sun is decaying and only you can stop it

Take control of a solar barrier and try to protect planets in your solar system from deadly solar flares! Score points for each keeping planets alive and blocking flares.

How to play

Try to block solar flares to earn points and protect planets

Move the barrier left/right with [A] and [D] or [Left} and [Right]. 

Press [Q] and [E] to change barrier modes.

Block solar flares with the matching colour mode

High Scores

Gain points by keeping planets alive for as long as possible. The more planets that are alive, the more points you will earn. 

Additionally earn points for each solar flare you block.

Try to get a highscore!

Made for the 2022 ScoreSpace x UltimateArcade GameJam, the theme was Decay.
